name: Dymunia
description:
Stelyvan discovered a terrible curse on Elysys. In five days, the ancient magic will consume her soul. In this limited time, Stelyvan and his allies must travel the world of Dymunia in search of the knowledge to remove her curse. Will you succeed? Her fate is in your hands. 

Within the spiral of time, there is only death.

Dymunia is an immersive visual novel (essentially an RPG without combat) with multiple paths. The game contains seven endings, including a perfect one that is tricky to get.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

The amazing music of this game was composed by Adrian von Ziegler and the Fiechters Brothers. The soundtrack of the game can be found in this YouTube playlist:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-laiCZ2fr14&list=PLL6V-K_k6mqqp7D7J4boYJeH7dcvXwNyI

 

You can support the artists on their respective Bandcamp pages:

Adrian von Ziegler: https://adrianvonziegler.bandcamp.com/

Fiechters Brothers: https://dbfiechter.bandcamp.com/
